text: Let 3 (translation: "Flight 3") are a rock band from Croatia. They are famous for their obscene songs and live performances. They became popular during the time of Yugoslavia. They were formed in the 1980s. == Political views == The band's members have voiced support for causes such as women's rights and LGBT rights. He have also voiced their opinions against Conservatism and the Catholic Church. == Eurovision Song Contest == In 2023, they were chosen to represent Croatia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2023. They came 25th in the jury vote and 7th in the public vote, finishing in 13th place overall out of 26 finalists. == Sources == Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:Croatian musicians
title: Let 3
